formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: The property that results will be returned into.

formElement.label: Location Name:
formElement.documentation: Configuration name, CSD location, CICSPlex Context, depending on Location Type value.

formElement.label: Location Type:
formElement.documentation: Location to list from: #### TODO location type must be 'Journal' for this procedure (to list from other location types, use the ListFromRepository or ListFromOther procedure instead)

formElement.label: Resource Type:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource type

formElement.label: Resource Name:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource name

formElement.label: Resource Group:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource group

formElement.label: Resource Definition Version:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource definition version

formElement.label: Serialized #### TODO Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Additional TODO ####(s) to ####: XML serialized list of sets of resource object criteria, one per additional ####, created using the procedure Serialize####ObjectCriteria (optional, the #### specified above is appended to this).

formElement.label: Restriction Criteria:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) restriction criteria, whitespace separated in <NAME>.<COMPARATOR>.<VALUE> format. Valid <COMPARATOR> values are EQ, NE, LT, GT, LE, and GE. Restriction criteria all on a single line are combined using logical AND. Groups of restriction critera on different lines are combined using logical OR. When listing BAImage journal records, you must prefix the field names of the embedded resource definitions with B_ for before or A_ for after images. For eaxmple, to limit the list to journal records whose before resource definition was chnaged after 26 June 2004, specify B_ChangeTime.GT.2004/06/26

formElement.label: Hashing Scope:
formElement.documentation: Determines whether or not the List command response contains a 'HashingValue' element with a checksum for each selected object, and which fields it uses to calculate the checksum

formElement.label: Object History:
formElement.documentation: Specifies whether to return all versions of an object from the repository, or only the current version.

formElement.label: CPID Formula:
formElement.documentation: CPIDFormula is relevant only when listing change packages.

formElement.label: Counts:
formElement.documentation: All Counts requests the server to include various count values in the response

formElement.label: Filter Date:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) limits the objects returned by List to those changed on or before the specified date and time. You can use this instead of, or in addition to, restriction criteria for change time. Format: yyyy/mm/dd.hh:mm

formElement.label: Limit:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) sets an upper limit to the number of resource definitions returned by List. If the number of resource definitions that match the specifications of the List command exceeds this limit, then the List command returns an error, with no resource definitions. This avoids the problems associated with returning a subset of objects that match the specifications: for example, depending on how a client sorts the results of the List command, omissions might not be apparent to the end user.
